title: cmd/yacc: expr example need support windows
body:
go version
go version devel +bddf2a72f5e1 Wed Nov 27 19:32:15 2013 +1100 windows/amd64

cd $(GOROOT)/src/cmd/yacc
make
rename expr expr.exe

expr.exe
> 1+2*3
2013/11/30 11:14:44 unrecognized character '\r'
7
>

1. expr need append executable extension.
2. need support '\r' character.
